title: MongoDB Import & Export
subject: MongoDB
theory: Unlike dump/restore (binary), import/export works with human-readable JSON or CSV. Useful for moving data between systems (e.g., MongoDB to Excel).

common_mistakes.correction: It loses data types (BSON types are converted to JSON). Use mongodump for backups.

real_world_use_cases.description: Exporting sales data to CSV for analysis in a spreadsheet tool.

summary: Tools for interoperability with external systems.
